content.query:
select top 10 *
from openrowset(
    bulk 'https://demosynapselake.dfs.core.windows.net/users/jci/FactInternetSales.csv',
    format = 'csv',
    header_row = TRUE,
    parser_version = '2.0') as rows

-- Create database
create database jci

-- Create view
CREATE VIEW FactInternetSales AS
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://demosynapselake.dfs.core.windows.net/users/jci/FactInternetSales.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [FactInternetSales]
